_header: It nis but truth I-wend on afte

BLHar913.First Lines:
Hit nic bot trewþ i wend an afteforte sette nego in eni
                    crafte…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…þus þe fals clerkes of har heuidMakiþ men
                    trewþ of ham be reuid
